net.grinder.statistics
Interface StatisticsSet

All Superinterfaces:
ImmutableStatisticsSet
All Known Implementing Classes:
StatisticsSetImplementation
public interface StatisticsSet
extends ImmutableStatisticsSet

Access to a set of long and double values. Clients can access individual values using an index object obtained from a StatisticsIndexMap.

Author:
Philip Aston
See Also:
Grinder.ScriptContext.getStatistics()

add

void add(ImmutableStatisticsSet operand)
